name: a-ripple-song
description: A Ripple Song is an all-in-one podcast theme for WordPress built on Sage. Publish podcasts and articles with dedicated templates, powerful theme options, and a flexible widget system for lists, members, subscriptions, banners, tags and footer links. Enjoy a modern audio player with playlist, speed control, waveform/spectrum visuals and uninterrupted playback across seamless Swup page transitions. Mobile-first responsive layout supports touch, keyboard navigation and screen readers. Includes RSS feed support, episode metadata, built-in post metrics, demo import and custom fields out of the box. Tailwind CSS + daisyUI styling and a Vite build pipeline keep it fast and easy to customize for creators and teams.

scripts.translate: npm run translate:pot && npm run translate:update
scripts.translate:update: for file in ./resources/lang/*.po; do wp i18n update-po ./resources/lang/a-ripple-song.pot $file; done
scripts.translate:compile: npm run translate:mo && npm run translate:js
